markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 18"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Perfect Ki Grandmaster](/Feats.aspx?ID=4063) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 222</row>

**Archetype** [Student of Perfection](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=18)

**Prerequisites**
[Perfect Ki Expert](/Feats.aspx?ID=4061) or [Perfect Ki Exemplar](/Feats.aspx?ID=4062)

</column>

---

You gain an appropriate ki spell for your School of Perfection: [_unblinking flame ignition_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1246) for Unblinking Flame, [_unbreaking wave containment_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1248) for Unbreaking Waves, [_unfolding wind crash_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1252) for Unfolding Wind, or [_untwisting iron pillar_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1254) for Untwisting Iron. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1. You become a master in occult spell DCs and occult spell attack rolls.
name: Perfect Ki Grandmaster
prerequisite: Perfect Ki Expert or Perfect Ki Exemplar

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 18" pfs="Standard" > Perfect Ki Grandmaster Source Impossible Lands pg. 222 Archetype Student of Perfection Prerequisites Perfect Ki Expert or Perfect Ki Exemplar --- You gain an appropriate ki spell for your School of Perfection: unblinking flame ignition for Unblinking Flame, unbreaking wave containment for Unbreaking Waves, unfolding wind crash for Unfolding Wind, or untwisting iron pillar for Untwisting Iron. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1. You become a master in occult spell DCs and occult spell attack rolls.
